welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kierspe, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our quaint town known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all that Kierspe has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Cologne/bonn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'DTM Free WiFi'.
